content.question: If <math><semantics><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation>MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahmart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWcaaWdaeaapeGaamizaiaadMhaa8aabaWdbiaadsgacaWG4baa aiabg2da9iaadIhapaWaaWbaaSqabeaapeGaaGinaaaakiabgkHiTi aaikdacaWG4bWdamaaCaaaleqabaWdbiaaiodaaaGccqGHRaWkcaaI ZaGaamiEaiabgkHiTiaaigdaaaa@4541@</annotation></semantics></math> , then <math><semantics><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow><annotation>MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahmart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWcaaWdaeaapeGaamiza8aadaahaaWcbeqaa8qacaaIZaaaaOGa amyEaaWdaeaapeGaamizaiaadIhapaWaaWbaaSqabeaapeGaaG4maa aaaaaaaa@3C49@</annotation></semantics></math> evaluated at x=2 is
